body_html: Can we switch to torchvision for mode defs? It makes no sense to copy them over, because eg that’s why densenet is currently broken. The model no longer matches the state dict, and while torchvision can patch it up, this code can’t. It’s not used in any CI tests so the failure is not that apparent

The model no longer matches the state dict, and while torchvision can patch it up, this code can’t. It’s not used in any CI tests so the failure is not that apparent
body: Can we switch to torchvision for mode defs? It makes no sense to copy them over, because eg that’s why densenet is currently broken. The model no longer matches the state dict, and while torchvision can patch it up, this code can’t. It’s not used in any CI tests so the failure is not that apparent
